page.title: 08CARDREW IND.EST.REDRUTH
page.content: In conclusion it might be generalised that the average business on the { {CARDREW INDUSTRIAL ESTATE, REDRUTH, {CORNWALL,}is the main branch, with 18 employees, 12 of whom are men and 6 women, 1 in management, 4 clerical, 6 skilled and 7 unskilled jobs. Most of these would have been recruited from the Redruth area, a school leaver would have been employed during the past 2 years, training would have been offered within the business but not outside. The raw material will be obtained from parts of Britain outside Cornwall and the product would be marketed within Cornwall, being delivered through the firm's own transport system.
